Title: Mistral AI raises 1.7B€ to accelerate technological progress with AI | Mistral AI
Description: We are announcing a Series C funding round of 1.7B€ at a 11.7B€ post-money valuation. This investment fuels our scientific research to keep pushing the frontier of AI to tackle the most critical and sophisticated technological challenges faced by strategic industries.

Title: Liquid Glass in the Browser: Refraction with CSS and SVG — kube.io
Description: Explore how to recreate Apple's stunning Liquid Glass effect using CSS, SVG Displacement Maps, and refraction calculations.

Title: No adblocker detected. (Maurycy's blog)
Description:
Internet ads are horrible:
They waste your time, and the advertising industry makes the internet a worse place.
Payouts are so small that the only way to survive is to turn your site into an ad filled hellhole with no real substance.
